tag_list: coin-operated-game-machine, arcade-game-machine, kiddie-rides, coin-pusher-machine, racing-car, game-equipment, crane-machine, claw-crane-machine, shooting-hoops-game-machine, arcade-video-game-machine, simulator
overview:
Homing Amusement & Game Machine Co.,Ltd Found in 2004,located in Panyu, Where is the biggest distribution center of game machines in China. Homing Company is specialized in manufacturing, selling and after-sale service of big electronic game machines, we provide with purchasing service of simulator game machines, redemption machine, cabinet machine, crane and prize machine, kiddie rides and kids land etc series prodcuts. 

   Homing Company has a high effective and high quality team,rely on our own high quality products and good service winning the customers from home and abroad approve and trust, most products exported to East-South Asia, South America and Europe countries, has built complete sales system.

 We will carry forward the spirit of &#8220;Pragmatic innovation and Enterprising&#8221;; insist on “honesty, quality first, customer first for the purpose”. We hope to make progress and development together with friends at home and abroad.

    Our purpose is &#8220;Win your trust and support through our honest service. Achieve mutual-benefit and reciprocity. Creat win-win together.
